detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#42-45) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#43)

JACK.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#109-115) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = balances[from].sub(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#110)
	- balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#112)
detectors.markdown:

	- [balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#L112)

detectors.description:
allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#24)
	- JACK.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#117-119)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#26)
	- JACK.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#102-106)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- JACK.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#149-151)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#27)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- JACK.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#98-100)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#29)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JACK__1.sol#30)
